# BA material file
#   Maxwell-Garnett approximations
#     r=.4, H=1.5, L=1, epsi=8: 
#     eps_22=eps_33 = 1.7
#
units="normalized";
name="diskEps8BAH.txt";
omegaScale=2.997924580000000e+15;
materialType="bianisotropic";
dispersiveModel="none";
bianisotropicK0=[\
1.0                  ,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,\
0.000000000000000e+00,1.7                  ,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,\
0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,1.7                  ,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,\
0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,1.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,\
0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,1.0                  ,0.000000000000000e+00,\
0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,0.000000000000000e+00,1.0                 ];
